00014 public class SingleAccessorManager

00020         public static final TreeMap<String, AbstractOrmEntity> getSingleAccessorList(
00021                         AbstractOrmEntity entity)
00022         {
00023                 TreeMap<String, AbstractOrmEntity> singleAccessorList = new TreeMap<String, AbstractOrmEntity>();
00024 
00025                 AbstractOrmEntity foreignEntityDefinition, realForeignEntity;
00026 
00027                 ListOfValue listOfValue;
00028 
00029                 for (String listOfValueName : entity.getPositiveListOfValueList()
00030                                 .keySet())
00031                 {
00032                         listOfValue = entity.getPositiveListOfValueList().get(
00033                                         listOfValueName);
00034                         foreignEntityDefinition = listOfValue.getForeignEntityDefinition();
00035 
00036                         realForeignEntity = getForeignEntity(entity,
00037                                         foreignEntityDefinition);
00038 
00039                         if (realForeignEntity != null)
00040                                 singleAccessorList.put(realForeignEntity.getSystemName(),
00041                                                 realForeignEntity);
00042                 }
00043 
00044                 return singleAccessorList;
00045         }
00046 
00047         private static AbstractOrmEntity getForeignEntity(
00048                         AbstractOrmEntity sourceEntity,
00049                         AbstractOrmEntity foreignEntityDefinition)
00050         {
00051                 foreignEntityDefinition.setData(foreignEntityDefinition
00052                                 .getPrimaryKeyName(), sourceEntity
00053                                 .getData(foreignEntityDefinition.getForeignKeyName()));
00054 
00055                 Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> resultSet = Orm
00056                                 .select(foreignEntityDefinition);
00057 
00058                 if (resultSet.size() > 0)
00059                         return resultSet.get(0);
00060 
00061                 return null;
00062         }
00063 
00069         public static AbstractOrmEntity getSingleAccessor(
00070                         AbstractOrmEntity abstractOrmEntity, String listOfValueName)
00071 
00072         {
00073                 AbstractOrmEntity foreignEntityDefinition, realForeignEntity;
00074 
00075                 ListOfValue listOfValue = abstractOrmEntity
00076                                 .tryMatchListOfValue(listOfValueName);
00077 
00078                 if (listOfValue != null)
00079                 {
00080                         listOfValue = abstractOrmEntity.getPositiveListOfValueList().get(
00081                                         listOfValueName);
00082                         foreignEntityDefinition = listOfValue.getForeignEntityDefinition();
00083 
00084                         realForeignEntity = getForeignEntity(abstractOrmEntity,
00085                                         foreignEntityDefinition);
00086 
00087                         return realForeignEntity;
00088                 }
00089                 return null;
00090         }
